synopsis.text: Shuurei Kou, the first female governor, and her friend Eigetsu To, aim to transform the impoverished Sa province into a center of academic research and prosperity. However, their plans meet opposition. When a mysterious illness spreads through Sa, a shady cult preys on people's fears. Eigetsu disappears, distracted by his past. Shuurei seeks medical texts to cure the illness, one from Eigetsu's father proves useful. However, the pandemic and Eigetsu's absence allow Shuurei's political opponents to undermine her authority. Shuurei faces many trials as she pursues her lifelong dream of being a government official. With strong allies, determination and intelligence, the young co-governors strive to implement their visionary plans to revitalize Sa province despite daunting obstacles.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
